text:
Taras Viktorovych Kutovy (; 25 February 1976 – 21 October 2019) was a Ukrainian economist and politician. He was born in Kiev. He was a member of the Verkhovna Rada from 2012 through 2014. He was Minister of Agrarian Policy and Food from 2016 through 2018.
Kutovy was killed in a helicopter crash on 21 October 2019 in Poltava Oblast at the age of 43.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Agrarian Policy and Food
